applicable_scenarios: Enabling or restricting access to property
steps: Draft separate application or joint prayer in plaint
Pay injunction-specific court fee (higher than normal)
File application with plaint or after filing suit
Court issues notice to opposite party
Brief hearing to assess prima facie case, balance of convenience, irreparable harm

timeline.interim_expires: Till final decree or further orders

fees.court_fee: ₹5 k–₹50 k+ depending on claim and court
fees.security_deposit: Court may require bond or caution money

special_provisions.ex_parte_injunction: Allowed in urgent cases until defendant heard
special_provisions.mandatory_injunction: To ensure positive acts by defendant

appeals.from_interim_order: Typically via revision to High Court

important_notes: Irreparable harm must be clearly demonstrated
